title: Question 15
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
Brett seems to be familiar with Jake’s habits. When he starts drinking quickly, she knows that he is going to get drunk. Later, in the taxi, she indicates that they have known each other for some time when she says, “we could have head such a damned good time together.” In other words, things might have been different between them. This implies that they have a history together, but that it has had problems or troubles. They have an ongoing and troubled relationship.


“Oh, Jake,” Brett said, “we could have had such a damned good time together.”
